Serialized Form

  • Package gate.iaaplugin

    • Class gate.iaaplugin.IaaMain extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      6987588770277158507L

      • Serialized Fields

        • annSetsForIaa

          String annSetsForIaa
          Annotation sets for merging in one document.

        • annTypesAndFeats

          String annTypesAndFeats
          Specifying the annotation types and features for merging.

        • verbosity

          String verbosity
          Specify the verbosity level for IAA results outputs.

        • verbo

          int verbo

        • measureType

          MeasureType measureType
          Specify the problem is a classification or not. For classification problem, compute and output the kappa measures as IAA. Otherwise, compute and output the F-measures.

        • fMeasure

          MeasureType fMeasure

        • agreementAndKappa

          MeasureType agreementAndKappa

        • overallTypesPairs

          float[] overallTypesPairs
          The overall Cohen's kappa value over all pairs and types.

        • kappaOverall

          float[][] kappaOverall
          The overall Cohen's kappa value for each type.

        • kappaPairwise

          float[][][] kappaPairwise
          The contingency table for each pair of annotator and each type.

        • numTypesKappa

          int numTypesKappa
          Number of types of kappa, now it's 3: Obeserved agreement, Cohen's kappa, and Scott's pi.

        • namesKappa

          String[] namesKappa

        • fMeasureOverall

          FMeasure[] fMeasureOverall
          The overall F-measure for each type.

        • fMeasuresPairwiseLabel

          HashMap<K,V> fMeasuresPairwiseLabel
          Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and each label.

        • isUsingLabel

          boolean isUsingLabel
          Using the labels or not for one type for IAA computation

        • numDocNotCounted

          int numDocNotCounted
          number of documents not being counted because they don't have some annotation set required.

        • fMeasuresPairwise

          FMeasure[][] fMeasuresPairwise
          Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and over all labels for each type.

        • fMeasureOverallTypes

          FMeasure fMeasureOverallTypes
          The overall F-measure for all types.

        • allTypeFeats

          HashMap<K,V> allTypeFeats
          All the types and features from all documents in corpus.

        • annsTypes

          HashMap<K,V> annsTypes
          Annotation type and the feature names.

        • bdmScoreFile

          URL bdmScoreFile
          The URL storing the BDM scores computed by bdmComputation plugin.

        • conceptNames2BDM

          HashMap<K,V> conceptNames2BDM
          the map from a pair of concepts to their bdm score.

        • isUsingBDM

          boolean isUsingBDM
          Whether or not using the BDM.

        • fMeasureOverallBDM

          FMeasure[] fMeasureOverallBDM
          The overall F-measure for each type for BDM.

        • fMeasuresPairwiseLabelBDM

          HashMap<K,V> fMeasuresPairwiseLabelBDM
          Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and each label for BDM.

        • fMeasuresPairwiseBDM

          FMeasure[][] fMeasuresPairwiseBDM
          Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and over all labels for each type for BDM.

        • fMeasureOverallTypesBDM

          FMeasure fMeasureOverallTypesBDM
          The overall F-measure for all types for BDM.
